output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, contains "11240002" at the end which appears to be a CMF number 2. Refers to candidate: Yes, directly references Marcel Ciolacu, a presidential candidate 3. Addresses wide population: Yes, it's a paid advertisement with significant reach (30,000-35,000 impressions) 4. Electoral objective: Yes, explicitly calls for electoral action ("Trimite acasă Ciolacul mincinos!") 5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content 6. Personal opinion: No, this is a structured, paid political attack from PNL Argeș
The post is clearly electoral propaganda because: - It directly attacks a presidential candidate (Ciolacu) - Contains explicit electoral call to action - Is paid advertising with significant reach - Contains a CMF number - Is published by a political party (PNL Argeș) - Makes campaign-specific claims about truthfulness and governance

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: 1. It directly targets a presidential candidate 2. Contains explicit electoral messaging 3. Is paid political advertising 4. Contains CMF number 5. Makes campaign-specific claims 6. Calls for specific electoral action
conclusion.message-for-police: PNL Argeș, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin publicarea și promovarea unei reclame electorale (ID Facebook: 597485686033312) după încheierea perioadei de campanie electorală. Postarea conține propagandă electorală negativă la adresa candidatului ION-MARCEL CIOLACU, având un îndemn explicit de a nu-l vota ("Trimite acasă Ciolacul mincinos!"), fiind promovată ca reclamă plătită pe Facebook și Instagram, cu un impact semnificativ (peste 30.000 de afișări). Postarea include număr CMF (11240002), confirmând natura sa de material electoral. Această activitate a continuat după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, încălcând astfel prevederile legale privind încheierea campaniei electorale.
